metadata.title: CVE-2022-1306 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Inappropriate implementation in compositing in Google Chrome prior to100.0.4896.88 allowed a remote attacker to spoof the contents of theOmnibox (URL bar) via a crafted HTML page.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
